input.purpose: A thank-you note after an interview
input.content: I enjoyed learning about the software engineer role and the team's projects. The company culture seems like a great fit.

output.subject: Thank you for the interview
output.body:
Dear [Hiring Manager's Name],

I wanted to take a moment to thank you for the opportunity to interview for the software engineer role at [Company Name]. It was a pleasure to meet with you and the rest of the team and learn more about the company and the projects you are currently working on.

I was particularly impressed by the innovative and challenging projects that your team is tackling. It was exciting to hear about the cutting-edge technologies and methodologies being used, and I am confident that I would thrive in such an environment.

Moreover, I was also impressed by the company culture and values that were evident throughout our conversation. The emphasis on collaboration, continuous learning, and a positive work-life balance align perfectly with my own values, and I believe I would be a great fit for the team.

Thank you again for considering me for this opportunity. I am even more enthusiastic about the role and the company after our interview, and I am looking forward to the next steps in the hiring process.

Please do not hesitate to reach out if you need any further information or have any additional questions. I am eagerly awaiting the chance to join the team at [Company Name] and contribute to its success.

Best regards,
[Your Name]
